Description:
"Brilliant Transformation of a Noted Property".
$450,000 plus
"Drysdale House"

In the heart of the Bellarine Peninsula, this corner site features an historic 1890s home with a modern, double-storey, superbly-appointed addition. A former feature of the Australian House Museum, this renovated and restored home offers a very flexible floorplan,and has many potential uses. With 5/6 bedrooms, 3 quality bathrooms, double lock-up garage, loads of off-street parking, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, this is your chance to set up a
charming home in a central location surrounded by established gardens. Alternatively, the home is large enough for an up market B & B, or could also be used as professional rooms or an art gallery - the choices are many and varied (STCA). The original home has been fastidiously restored and renovated and the recent double storey addition enhances and amplifies the home's many attributes. Unique investment potential or comfortable residence.
Close to wineries, restaurants, , beaches, shops, school(s), public transport, lake and charming Queenscliff-Drysdale tourist railway service and Geelong.
* Restored and renovated * 5/6 bed rooms
* Historic home * Bellarine Peninsula
Insights: 2 other 5 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
4 bedroom home with superb, panoramic views
$370,000 plus
Downstairs is a generous lounge room and 2 bedrooms with BIR's and bathroom (shower and bath) with separate toilet. A good-sized laundry adjoins the double lock up garage with extra roller door to the large rear terraced garden. Upstairs is an open plan meals and living area (air conditioner) with expansive views and access to the upper deck.
There is a first class kitchen with European appliances, lots of cupboards and a full preparation bench. There are 2 further bedrooms, the main with ensuite, WIR and access to the deck capturing the panoramic views. Also, lots of natural light, external remote-controlled blinds, in a first class estate with many quality homes in the immediate area.
* Excellent floor plan
* Expansive views
* Easy access to shops, schools etc
* Entertainer's home in first class estate

Description:
Parent/teen dream
$400,000 plus
Two years old this J.G. King executive home has a floor plan most would ache for. Combining the latest in modern living, parents can enjoy the upper level while children can entertain friends below without disruption.
Showcasing this outstanding design, the upper level houses a gourmet kitchen with the latest in stainless steel appliances (Still under new home warranty). The meals and living areas supply uninterrupted views spanning Corio Bay and sliding doors open to reveal a balcony combining the living/entertaining zones. The master bedroom has its own balcony, parents’ retreat, walk-in robe and ensuite with spa.
Downstairs, two double bedrooms have built-in robes. A study off the second living area easily converts to a fourth bedroom. A large bathroom is central to all bedrooms along with a powder room and laundry offering internal access from a double garage.
Five-star energy rated, enhanced with gas central heating and a split system, and incorporating all the luxuries possible, this stunning home is a must to inspect.
* Breathtaking views of Corio Bay
* Lower deck plus balcony
* Parent/teenager friendly
* Stunning gourmet kitchen
Land Irreg. 648sq m approx.
Terms 10% deposit, balance 60/ 90 days

Address: 178 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
LIFESTYLE POSITION
Located only five minutes stroll from the Clifton Springs Golf Club where you can enjoy a relaxing meal out whilst taking in the panoramic views. If you are an early bird enjoy a round of golf on this sought after local course. Nearby is the well known Dell area of secluded beach perfect for youngsters and the young at heart. Quiet streets with established trees and gardens make this a truly sublime place to call home.
The home is of solid construction with great living space. The spacious north-facing lounge is light-filled with views to the bay. Open plan dining, family and kitchen areas with WIP have access to an exterior deck. There are three generous, queen sized bedrooms with WIR & ensuite or BIRs. Gas heating, split system air con and ceiling fans. The home has been well cared for by the current vendors but lends itself to some modern touches being added.
A large undercover area of approx 15mx5m, garage workshop and back garden give the home handy person the perfect outdoor area. Block size approx 604m2.
Inspection a must !

Address: 10 Half Moon Crescent Indented Head VIC 3223
Description:
Life by the Beach...
A terrific building block titled ready to start a new for-ever home or beach house.
NBN approved with services at the gate ready to hook onto including mains gas.
Good quality homes have been built in the area, a nice location for peace and enjoyment.
Only 350 metres from the beach - a short stroll to enjoy good swimming for children and BBQ facilities with playgrounds. A launching boat ramp for the boat or jet ski enables an array of water sports.
Walking and cycling tracks to enjoy the scenery and fresh air of the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
Fantastic Land Opportunity
The Feel:
An outstanding opportunity presents for those looking to purchase in the in-demand Bay Breeze Estate and build their dream home on the coast. This sizeable and level allotment is offered at an affordable price point, making an ideal home site for passive solar design, harnessing an enviable indoor/outdoor lifestyle for years to come.
The Facts:
-Bonus $25,000 for HomeBuilder scheme or $45,000 for first home buyers!* Conditions Apply
-540 sqm of level ground, making construction a breeze
- East/West orientation takes full advantage of the Northerly sun
-Walk to St Leonards Golf Club, Lake Reserve and the main street
-5 minutes to the pristine bayside beaches across St Leonards
-15 minute drive to Portarlington-Docklands Ferry terminal
-Titled and ready to be built on today!

Description:
A Clifton Springs Gem
This Clifton Springs gem is an opportunity to secure property in this amazing bay side town that is within walking distance to everything and at an entry level price. This solid 3 bedroom property is an ideal first home or addition to your property portfolio, with a flexible floorplan to either keep as is or renovate and extend to create an amazing abode for your Bellarine lifestyle. A stroll down the road are the Clifton Springs Golf Club, Clifton Springs Bowling Club and The Dell, meaning summer afternoons on the Bellarine Peninsula can be enjoyed swimming, bowling, golfing or just sitting on the expansive north facing deck at the 19th for a quiet beverage overlooking the water at sunset. Call today for an inspection.

Description:
HOMELY, SAFE & SERENE OASIS
We are delighted to be offering private viewing opportunities for this beautiful property in which LJHâs Covid safe protocols will apply. Please phone Caroline Rickard your local agent to arrange your private tour and INITIALLY please also view our Video.
Sanctuary living and working from home, with office and workshop space. Be suitably impressed by this versatile and unique three bedroom family home immaculate throughout, HUGE 75M2 fully serviced garage, come tradesman's workshop &/or tradies storage facility for Boats, Trailers, Motorbikes, Jet Ski's & Caravan.
Many people are now looking for a private oasis away from the hustle and bustle that they can relax and enjoy in this interesting time that we find ourselves in. Clifton Springs is fast becoming a suburb of choice because of its affordability without losing any of the things we want to work, live & play.
Everyday facilities' from shopping to leisure are all in this space.
Behind the picket fence of this fantastic property are numerous creature comforts and practical living features to be appreciated. Where do I begin?
Enter this easily accessed all on one level, well-appointed and superbly maintained residence via the large and welcoming entry area, to a spacious L-shaped lounge and dining area.
This style of home was designed around the principal of family interaction within a generous kitchen, with room for the largest family size Fridge. With ample storage space, 900mm cooktop and room to move for more than one master-chef in the house whilst overlooking the lush external fern garden.
This lovely home provides three generously proportioned bedrooms including full ensuite and built in robe to the Master Suite, BIR to Bed 2, with Bed 3 featuring direct sliding door access to the undercover north facing Pergola oasis. Some may prefer to use this room as a study. The main bathroom includes updated shower and spa bath with separate vanity and storage cupboard. Located adjacent is the separate WC and well-proportioned laundry with direct access to the garden and rear yard.
The north facing private secluded rear yard features established and well maintained garden and invites you to sit around with family and friends and enjoy the serenity. All rear and side boundary fences are new and provide excellent privacy to this relaxing outlook over the landscaped area with more to enjoy in the mature protected fern garden on the west side of the property to cool the house from the afternoon sun.
Being conscious about how we care for our environment; the house includes power saving photovoltaic solar panels to reduce your energy bills and additional rainwater tanks to keep the gardens looking pristine and green (both tanks have pumps).
This property has it all. A HUGE 75m2 fully enclosed and secure 4 car garage with double garage doors and automation. All of this with direct access to a concrete driveway large enough for uninterrupted secure caravan storage with easy and direct street access.
Upon entry to this excellently appointed and practical property there's also a carport on driveway, so you're off street parking needs are catered for with a fenced and private front and rear yard, allowing you worry free security of your well-loved pets within the beautiful landscaped surrounds.
Due to COVID-19 Regulations, inspections are by appointment only. Wearing of masks and social distancing apply. Please contact Caroline Rickard on 0408-989221 to organise a private viewing inspection.

Description:
STYLISH DESIGN & ROOM FOR THE BOAT!
This superb custom built home in a brilliant location is the one you've been waiting for! Located within walking distance to pristine sandy beaches and the Portarlington Safe Harbour, you can jump on a Ferry, spend a day in Melbourne and return to the peace and tranquility of coastal living enjoying fishing, swimming and Award winning wineries just down the road!
Set on approx. 619m2, this 6 star energy efficient home enjoys a high lift garage door with drive through access to the rear for boat or caravan storage.
Interior features include a modern well designed floor plan with a beautiful stone bench-tops throughout, open plan living and dining, 3 bedrooms including Master with WIR and ensuite and a separate lounge room. Privacy and a low maintenance landscaped garden together with an alfresco area perfect for the afternoon BBQ compliment the design space and position of this home.
Internal area
223m²

Description:
PRIVATE HAVEN, LOW MAINTENANCE AND BIG WORKSHOP!
Diligently maintained over the years with nothing to do but enjoy the lifestyle on the Bellarine. Generous entrance, formal lounge and a fabulous second room with dining , living and large kitchen, both living rooms have doors opening to entertaining area framed with colour from the matured private gardens, just beautiful. Three bedrooms, extra generous main with ensuite and WIR, others have BIR'S, study, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features central heating, evaporative cooling, timber flooring, extra insulation for soundproofing, quality furnishings and fittings, dishwasher, and more to entice the astute buyer. Double garage with internal access, HUGE WORKSHOP a real bonus , trades people NOTE. Position is great ,walk to schools, golf club, the jetty and the Dell. Wow see you soon!

Description:
RENOVATED ! BAY VIEWS ! SOLAR AND ROOM FOR THE BOAT!
This home has been well maintained and it shows. The lounge room is light and bright, extra sitting area or formal dining, second flexible space has a fabulous new kitchen with so much storage and plenty of space for meals and living, doors open to undercover patio. Three bedrooms, main with full dressing room and ensuite, other two have BIR'S, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Features include two split systems, fans, solar panels, new flooring, window furnishings, dishwasher, Westinghouse 900 SSS oven, security blinds and so much storage.
Double carport, space for the boat/caravan, two sheds and such a well cared for garden.
The court position is private and close to the bay with walking tracks for leisure, take the boat out on the bay for the day. The living is easy here at no 15 Taronga Court.

Description:
Corner block priced to sell !!
Boasting a prime corner location in the new sector of the Seachange Estate, this flexible 345m2 block is fully titled, ready to build upon and priced to sell.
Located on the corner of Miranda Crescent & Port Deakin Street, the block offers a flat profile and proportions that cater for an abundance of new home designs with all services including NBN and gas available at the street.
With generous Government incentives currently being offered for new home builds, now is the ideal opportunity to snap up a bargain and plan for your future Bellarine lifestyle.
Contact us now for more information!

Description:
Tranquil Position With Bay Views
The Feel:
Welcome to a place of peace, quiet & tranquility in a unique setting with scenic wildlife views. This elevated position offers a front row vantage point over the conservation reserve & panoramic bay views to the You Yangs. Coastal living or a holiday retreat, this double storey home offers 3BRs, including a master with walk-thru robe & dual entry en-suite with convenient powder room. Open plan living upstairs is saturated in natural light, with triple stacker doors connecting to the deck.
The Facts:
-Less than 350m approx. from the bayside walking trails & foreshore
-Optimal north facing orientation maximises 270 bay views & year-round sunshine
-Upstairs OP living zone with incredible views, SSAC & gas log fireplace
-U-shaped kitchen, with brekky bar & ample storage
-Quality stainless steel apps: 600mm electric oven/gas hob, DW
-Triple stacker sliding doors provides seamless connection to the outdoors
-Timber laminate flooring, with carpets to bedrooms
-Master suite has spacious walk-through robe & en-suite with separate powder room
-2 additional BRs with built-in robes
-Central family bathroom with shower, bath, vanity & separate WC
-Low maintenance landscape with retaining walls at rear
-RC SLUG with internal access + OSP on aggregate concrete driveway
-Foreground views of Point Richard Flora & Fauna Reserve, with sparkling bay views beyond
The Owner Loves.
We have enjoyed many years here, and also have a successful history of holiday letting. There are few places you can enjoy such unhindered bay views combined with the beauty of a conservation reserve - the birds & wildlife are spectacular.

Description:
Spacious Family Living in Lovely Neighbourhood
The Feel:
Popular with families due to its great position central to schools & Curlewis Shopping Centre, this location is also close to green reserves & a short drive to beaches. Designed to accommodate the evolving needs of family life, this 4-bed, 2-bath home also offers 2 spacious living areas, & seamless access to the covered east-facing deck for outdoor entertaining. A well-equipped kitchen & meals area forms the central hub for a large family who will love the advantages of living in this friendly neighbourhood.
The Facts:
-Exceptional family home with generous proportions & stylish finishes
-Cleverly designed floorplan designed to maximise space while providing separate relaxation zones
-First impressions of neat exterior finish with well-kept garden & timber portico entrance
-Welcoming entry reveals freshly painted interior surfaces & beautiful bamboo flooring
-3.3m ceiling height to light, bright OP kitchen/family/meals, with high light windows to east aspect
-Stylish kitchen features servery bench, walk-in pantry & pendant lighting
-Quality s/s apps; 900mm Technika f/s electric oven, 5 burner gas hob, Bosch DW
-Free flow via stacker doors to expansive deck & entertaining area w/ café blinds
-2nd living offers relaxed lounge/theatre, or versatile games room/rumpus
-Direct access to low maintenance backyard & rear merbau deck
-4 well-appointed bedrooms (or 3BRs with study) easily accommodates growing family
-North facing Master with tinted privacy windows, en-suite & walk-in robe
-Main family bathroom with deep bath & shower, plus separate WC
-Ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, RC ceiling fans in all bedrooms and 2 living areas
-Laundry with ample room & cupboard space + linen press in hallway
-Efficient features: part tinted windows, 2kw solar panels, gas boosted solar hot water
-Zosi remote access 4xcamera security system, video intercom
-RC DLUG & side gate access via double gate provides access to utilities + 3x1.2m shed
The Owner Loves.
We love how this house is all in one.. there are places to enjoy a little pocket of peace, whether that be in zoned bedrooms or 2 distinctive outdoor areas. Our favourite part of the house is the main family living area, stepping straight out onto the huge deck which enjoys absolute privacy. Its a warm & inviting neighbourhood, full of families.

Description:
Invest in your future
It doesn't get much better than this. Smack dab on the shoreline with unbeatable and unobstructed views of the lagoon and Edwards Point Wildlife Reserve.
Open plan kitchen, living and dining mean whenever you pop in to stay, you've still got plenty of room to spread out whether that's from the cozy kitchen to the fantastic sunroom or even into the backyard for a game of cricket and a barbie at the water's edge.
Two spacious bedrooms with built in robes adorn this beach cottage with a central bathroom, fitted with shower, vanity & toilet.
Perfect position makes this one property you don't want to miss.
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection or a personalised virtual tour in your own lounge room via different media formats. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.

Description:
Attention Fishermen or car enthusiasts....
A 3 bedroom home on a large block (665sqm) with a 101sqm garage !!
Need space for boats or cars? Need a large back yard?
Entering the home to open plan living, dining and kitchen, light and bright.
For comfort reverse cycle split system, and gas log fire. Ceiling fans throughout.
Good sized kitchen area with plenty of cupboard space. Bathroom containing bath and shower and toilet, with additional separate toilet. Carpeted double bedrooms.
Covered outdoor area, and large backyard giving plenty of room to spread out.
The garage is unbelievable - so much room for the workshop and vehicles.

Description:
Titled Land with Stunning Bay Views
The Feel:
The best land in Clifton Springs was snapped up and built on long ago with the exception of this large vacant lot in one of the townships best streets! A wide frontage and sweeping bay views are here and ready to support your dream coastal home.
The Facts:
- 665sqm approx. of sought-after vacant land to build your dream home (STCA)
- Neighbouring established homes have some of the best bay views in the area
- Wide 18.2m (approx) frontage permits great rear yard access for vehicles
- Arguably the best orientation with north-facing rear aspect
- Comfortable walk to Drysdales shops, cafes and primary school
- Peacefully quiet neighbourhood with parkland 50m away
Owner Loves....
Weve always loved the streetscape of Panoramic Terrace. Theres some really premium homes who benefit from incredible north-facing views of the bay from Geelong to Melbourne

A true statement in executive townhouse living this stunning residence is a must to inspect.
The layout is superb boasting three bedrooms, two bathrooms (ensuite to master) and double garage with internal access.
The light-filled living space opens to a beautifully appointed kitchen featuring quality appliances.
Complete with low maintenance gardens this property offers hassle free living at its best.
Located in central St Leonards only a few hundred metres to the beach, retail hub and iconic pier this brand new townhouse awaits a new owner.
Securely leased at $340 per week until June, 2020.

Description:
All Investors Stop Here!
With a great tenant in place and a lease signed to May 2021 - add this one too your portfolio today. Large 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom & 2 living ready for your finishing touches. Step down to the sizeable lounge with a reverse cycle split system. Master bedroom has pocket bay views, walk in robe & full en-suite. Vast open plan kitchen & dining area is tiled with a ceiling fan & sliding out to undercover alfresco. Kitchen has stainless steel wall oven; 5 burner gas cook top & plenty of cupboards. Large 2nd living is light filled with views of the backyard, a gas heater & sliding door again to the pergola. Down the hall are bigger than average bedrooms that both have vertical blinds & built in robes. Central bathroom & toilet. Out the back is a storage/workshop, garden shed & plenty of yard for kids & pets to play. Tandem 2 car carport behind roller doors for secure parking. This awaits you on a great 604m2 block. Close to local schools, shopping centres, cafes, public transport, medical facilities & everything the Bellarine has to offer such as the bay, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services & wineries just to mention a few.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
